snippet: The Lace Metal floor lamp hides the bulb behind a dense portion of mesh.
abstract: Swedish design studio Form Us With Love creates Lace Metal floor lamp, which hides bulb behind dense portion of mesh.
lead_paragraph: The Lace Metal floor lamp hides the bulb behind a dense portion of mesh.

headline.seo: Lace Metal Floor Lamp Masks Light Bulb
headline.main: A Light Bulb Pulls a Disappearing Act
